title: Video Game Creator Vince Zampella Dies in Car Crash
summary: Vince Zampella, a famous video game creator, died in a car crash in California. He was 55 years old. He helped make the popular game series Call of Duty, which started in 2003 and has sold over 500 million copies. The crash happened on a highway in Los Angeles when his car hit a barrier and caught fire. Another person was also in the car and died too. Vince Zampella worked on other big games like Medal of Honor and Apex Legends. People who knew him said he was a kind person who cared about making fun games for players. His death is a sad loss for the gaming world.
